ygData.subject: Re: specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There is a separate skill in specialization for each spell discipline. Only one of your specialization skills may be over 50.  Your normal spell skills are
ygData.messageBody:
Tim Borelli wrote:
>
> From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
>
> well, considering all my discliplines except conjuration are around 110,
> i'll miss that =P. and trust me, when you hit lvl 20, you want your
> conjuraion to be higher than 50, you fiz a LOT if it's low when trying to
> cast the lvl 20 pet... at least, i do =)
>

There is a separate skill in specialization for each spell discipline.
Only one of your specialization skills may be over 50. Your normal
spell skills are not affected. Thus specialization will help alll
your skills, but only one specialization can truly excel.

Does that make sense?

Kaela
